title: Divisional Round Saturday Recap: Titans stun Ravens as Lamar struggles, 49ers dominate Vikings (Football 1/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap Saturday's divisional round playoff games. The guys start by discussing the Titans shocking 28-12 victory over the Ravens (:35) as they analyze Lamar Jackson's tough night and how Tennessee expertly game-planned for Baltimore's offensive attack. The Pick Six Superfriends also break down Ryan Tannehill's limited usage, Derrick Henry's dominance and the Titans formula for winning the AFC Championship and Super Bowl. Next, Will, Ryan, John and Sean react to the 49ers 27-10 win over the Vikings (44:00), as they evaluate the quarterback performances from Jimmy Garoppolo and Kirk Cousins, Minnesota's bad offense, Richard Sherman's fiery postgame rant and the rest of San Francisco's scary defense. Finally, the biggest winners and losers from Saturday's action (1:14:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
